text: How long does it usually take for a template to be approved?

commonly asked question but - their last time estimate was 7-10 business days, their goal is to get it down to 24 hours.

They have basically 2 people manually hand reviewing and testing all of the submissions right now, and they have a backlog currently.

Their goal is once they figure out how to automate a lot of aspects of their testing and quality control to be able to move much faster. Things are currently still the early days.
